ygData.subject: Re: question here
ygData.msgSnippet: In Neriak, in the second zone (can t remember what it s called, but where the caster s guild is), there is a merchant who sells most, if not all of the
ygData.messageBody:
In Neriak, in the second zone (can't remember
what it's called, but where the caster's guild is),
there is a merchant who sells most, if not all of the
patterns i think. I think it's the only place to buy
patterns in all of Neriak, unless there is a merchant in
the first zone who does also. <br><br>I may be wrong,
as it's been some time since i've been back to
Neriak. In fact, I've made so many light race friends
that I'm sure there is a bounty on my head there. Oh
well... I'm mostly into trickery and tomfollery, not
evil. I guess I should just stay in Halfling form, as
that fits my personality a bit better than this dark
skin I was born with...<br><br>Mandir<br>DE, ELF, DWF,
HLF, GNM, HUM, ERU, BAR chanter of the 17th
trickery<br>Outcast of Neriak<br>Dwarf-friend<br>Xev
